meanings.definition: A person who engages in a noisy or violent fight or quarrel.
meanings.sent1: The brawlers in the schoolyard were shouting loudly during their fight.
meanings.sent2: The two brawlers were throwing punches at each other in the street.
meanings.sent3: The brawlers argued over who would get the last cookie in a silly manner.
meanings.sent4: The brawlers clashed like thunder and lightning, their anger palpable.
meanings.sent5: The image of the brawlers wrestling will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A video game character who specializes in hand-to-hand combat.
meanings.sent1: In the game, players can choose powerful brawlers to defeat enemies.
meanings.sent2: The brawlers in the video game have unique fighting styles and abilities.
meanings.sent3: The brawlers in the game engaged in a fierce battle for supremacy.
meanings.sent4: The brawlers' punches felt like virtual explosions in the game world.
meanings.sent5: Controlling the brawlers requires quick reflexes and strategic thinking.
